core:process.core:comment: Test if contactless is possible and if so, prompt for amount 'up front'.

core:processNote.core:description:
If EnableContactless and DefaultTender are set on input, then will prompt for amount. Contactless is only possible if ICCReaderConfiguration.enableContactlesss is set and amount entered is <= contactlessTransactionLimit.
Sets EnableContactless on output, sets TenderAmount if contactless is possible.
A temporary tender item is used, and tender limit checks etc are performed using the DEFAULT CARD tender. The tender item is output to pass the amount (and in future possibly other info such as DCC currency or cashback amount) to the StartContactless action. It will later be re-initialised in CardTenderInitialisation.

TODO Cashback is possible with contactless but amount must be captured upfront. We don't have PaymentCardType yet so can't call existing GetCashback process here. DCC is also allegedly possible but would presumably also have to choose currency upfront.

core:eventLink.core:comment: Go straight to get amount whatever the balance if enableCOntacteless set on input
